Room.Name: Beach Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a road between the rocky beach and a lush jungle.
Room.LongDescription: The road disappears into the sand on the beach, but seems to be an old and established way through the tropical jungle toward the west. A pile of small animal bones is stacked neatly beside the road, just as it enters the jungle. Some of the bones are placed so as to form a kind of message, but you are unable to read their meaning.
